entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
